channel.title: Beyond The Sunset - VJM (The Debut Full-Length Album)
channel.description:
“I’m just here trying to break some stereotypes about the electronic sound; I’m here to knock down unnecessary boundaries separating all different lovers of music. My mission is for my debut album to be for everyone—for people of all age groups and musical tastes.” - VJM
[(((( GO BEYOND ))))](https://open.spotify.com/album/4PGvb3gFEZSXJDtGKMNOVL?si=anbqaN3rS-uA3u1z9QSnPw)
